nOfUtxos.title: Number of UTXOs
nOfUtxos.description: The number of UTXOs grouped by block height. You may read this as y UTXOs have been created before x block height.

valuesOfUtxos.title: Cummulative value of UTXOs
valuesOfUtxos.description: The cummulative value of UTXOs grouped by block height. You may read this as y PPC are unspent since x block height.
